meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the era between the Paleozoic and Cenozoic eras, comprising the Triassic, Jurassic, and Cretaceous periods.
meanings.sent1: The fossils found in the mesozoic rocks helped scientists learn about ancient life forms.
meanings.sent2: During the mesozoic era, dinosaurs roamed the Earth.
meanings.sent3: The mesozoic landscapes must have been quite different from what we see today.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took her back to a mesozoic world filled with giant reptiles.
meanings.sent5: The mesozoic climate was warmer compared to the present day.

meanings.sent1: Many fascinating discoveries have been made about the mesozoic through fossil studies.
meanings.sent2: Learning about the mesozoic in school was both fun and educational.
meanings.sent3: The museum exhibit on the mesozoic era captured the attention of all visitors.
meanings.sent4: In her dream, she traveled back in time to the mesozoic and saw dinosaurs up close.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the mesozoic period in history class was truly enlightening.
